scripts.pm2:start: turbo run pm2:start && cd sudo-apis && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.setup: turbo run setup && cd sudo-apis && bash setup.sh && npm run pm2:start
scripts.redeploy: git pull && npm install && cd sudo-apis && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd .. && turbo run redeploy && npm run restart-services
scripts.restart-services: pm2 stop all || true && pm2 delete all || true && npm run pm2:start
